In this notebook we save the data in R native format after processing using notebook `cameta-classification.qmd`

## Preliminaries

Load packages:
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
library(sf)
library(usethis)
```

Read processed data:
```{r}
cameta_class <- st_read(paste0(here::here(), "/data-raw/data-outputs/cobertura_cameta_classificado.shp"))
```

Convert classification to factor:
```{r}
cameta_class <- cameta_class |>
  mutate(CLASSIFICA = factor(CLASSIFICA))
```

Plot:
```{r}
ggplot(data = cameta_class, aes(fill = CLASSIFICA)) + 
  geom_sf()
```

Save data:
```{r}
usethis::use_data(cameta_class,
                  overwrite = TRUE)
```
